sourcesContent:
Resource List

  • {{ resource.title }}

    {{ resource.description }}

    Type: {{ resource.content }}

    Created By: {{ resource.createdBy }}

    Created At: {{ resource.createdAt | date }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ResourceService } from '../../../Services/resource/resource.service'; import { Resource } from '../../../DTO/resource'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resource-list', templateUrl: './resource-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resource-list.component.scss'] }) export class ResourceListComponent { resources: Resource[]; constructor(public resourceService: ResourceService) { this.resources = this.resourceService.getResources(); } deleteResource(id: string): void { if (confirm('Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette ressource ?')) { this.resourceService.deleteResource(id); this.resources = this.resourceService.getResources(); } } }
